

[L+A for Unlimited Coconut Stack]
DD000000 00000201
D3000000 10000000
25FBEAD0 0000001D
25FBEAD1 00000020

[L to copy slot 1 R to paste to slot 1]
DD000000 00000200
D9000000 15FBEAD0
D6000000 17447D48
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000100
D9000000 17447D48
D6000000 15FBEAD0

[L+A for 99k Bells in slot 1]
DD000000 00000201
D3000000 10000000
25FBEAD0 00000012
25FBEAD1 00000021

[L+A for golden rose in slot 1]
DD000000 00000201
D3000000 10000000
25FBEAD0 000000A0
25FBEAD1 000000A8

[L+A to clear inv slot 1]
DD000000 00000201
D3000000 10000000
25FBEAD0 000000FE
25FBEAD1 0000007F

[L+Y/R+Y read/write slot 1 id at ATM]
DD000000 00000A00
DA000000 25FBEAD0
D7000000 170605E8
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000900
DA000000 170605E8
D7000000 25FBEAD0

[Unlock Nook's Emporium]
